attributes.action: Re-nationalise all public utilities and public transport(rail & bus)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Privatisation of public services was one of the greatest evils of the Thatcher regieme. It places profits before service and has caused efficient, safe public services to be run down to benefit shareholders/fat cat directors

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
